targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    count(created_at) as tasks
    
FROM $DB.metrics_task

WHERE
    $timeFilterByColumn(created_at)
    $conditionalTest(AND host = '$host', $host) $conditionalTest(AND app_id = '$app_id', $app_id) AND error = 0
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    count(created_at) as tasks
    
FROM crusty.metrics_task

WHERE
    created_at >= toDateTime(1621354694)
     AND host = 'crawler-1'   AND app_id = 'crusty'  AND error = 0

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    count(created_at) as tasks
    
FROM $DB.metrics_task

WHERE
    $timeFilterByColumn(created_at)
    $conditionalTest(AND host = '$host', $host) $conditionalTest(AND app_id = '$app_id', $app_id) AND error = 1
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    count(created_at) as tasks
    
FROM crusty.metrics_task

WHERE
    created_at >= toDateTime(1621354689)
     AND host = 'crawler-1'   AND app_id = 'crusty'  AND error = 1

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    max(created_at) as time,
    sum(read_size_b) / 5 as rx,
    sum(write_size_b) / 5 as tx
FROM $DB.metrics_task

WHERE
    $timeFilterByColumn(created_at)
    $conditionalTest(AND host = '$host', $host) $conditionalTest(AND app_id = '$app_id', $app_id)
GROUP BY intDiv(toRelativeSecondNum(created_at), 5)

ORDER BY time
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    max(created_at) as time,
    sum(read_size_b) / 5 as rx,
    sum(write_size_b) / 5 as tx
FROM $DB.metrics_task

WHERE
    created_at >= toDateTime(1620735993)
     AND host = 'crawler-1'   AND app_id = 'rusty-spider' 
GROUP BY intDiv(toRelativeSecondNum(created_at), 5)

ORDER BY time

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    max(created_at) as time,
    sum(items) / 5 as inserted
FROM $DB.metrics_db

WHERE
    $timeFilterByColumn(created_at)
    AND table_name = 'domain_discovery' AND label = 'insert' $conditionalTest(AND host = '$host', $host) $conditionalTest(AND app_id = '$app_id', $app_id)
    
GROUP BY intDiv(toRelativeSecondNum(created_at), 5)
    
ORDER BY time
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    max(created_at) as time,
    sum(items) / 5 as inserted
FROM crusty.metrics_db

WHERE
    created_at >= toDateTime(1621346080)
    AND table_name = 'domain_discovery' AND label = 'insert'  AND host = 'crawler-1'   AND app_id = 'crusty' 
    
GROUP BY intDiv(toRelativeSecondNum(created_at), 5)
    
ORDER BY time

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    max(created_at) as time,
    sum(items) / 5 / 100 as read
FROM $DB.metrics_db

WHERE
    $timeFilterByColumn(created_at)
    AND table_name = 'domain_discovery' AND label = 'read' $conditionalTest(AND host = '$host', $host) $conditionalTest(AND app_id = '$app_id', $app_id)
    
GROUP BY intDiv(toRelativeSecondNum(created_at), 5)
    
ORDER BY time
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    max(created_at) as time,
    sum(items) / 5 / 100 as read
FROM crusty.metrics_db

WHERE
    created_at >= toDateTime(1621346080)
    AND table_name = 'domain_discovery' AND label = 'read'  AND host = 'crawler-1'   AND app_id = 'crusty' 
    
GROUP BY intDiv(toRelativeSecondNum(created_at), 5)
    
ORDER BY time

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    max(created_at) as time,
    sum(error) / 5 as error,
    count(created_at) / 5 as pages
FROM $DB.metrics_task

WHERE $timeFilterByColumn(created_at) $conditionalTest( AND host = '$host', $host) $conditionalTest( AND app_id = '$app_id', $app_id)

GROUP BY intDiv(toRelativeSecondNum(created_at), 5)

ORDER BY time
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    max(created_at) as time,
    sum(error) / 5 as error,
    count(created_at) / 5 as pages
FROM crusty.metrics_task

WHERE created_at >= toDateTime(1621500376)  AND host = 'crawler-1'   AND app_id = 'crusty' 

GROUP BY intDiv(toRelativeSecondNum(created_at), 5)

ORDER BY time

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:

    max(created_at) as time,
    sum(took_ms) / 5 as insert
FROM $DB.metrics_db

WHERE
    $timeFilterByColumn(created_at)
    AND table_name = 'domain_discovery' AND label = 'insert' $conditionalTest(AND host = '$host', $host) $conditionalTest(AND app_id = '$app_id', $app_id)
    
GROUP BY intDiv(toRelativeSecondNum(created_at), 5)
    
ORDER BY time

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    max(created_at) as time,
    sum(parse_time_ms) / sum(read_size_b) / 5 * 1024 * 1024 as parsing_time_per_1mb_of_html
FROM $DB.metrics_task

WHERE $timeFilterByColumn(created_at) $conditionalTest(AND host = '$host', $host) $conditionalTest(AND app_id = '$app_id', $app_id)

GROUP BY intDiv(toRelativeSecondNum(created_at), 5)

ORDER BY time
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    max(created_at) as time,
    sum(parse_time_ms) / sum(read_size_b) / 5 * 1024 * 1024 as parsing_time_per_1mb_of_html
FROM $DB.metrics_task

WHERE created_at >= toDateTime(1620735918)  AND host = 'crawler-1'   AND app_id = 'rusty-spider' 

GROUP BY intDiv(toRelativeSecondNum(created_at), 5)

ORDER BY time

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    updated_at as time,
    len as jobs
FROM $DB.metrics_queue

WHERE
    $timeFilterByColumn(time)
    AND name = 'Job' $conditionalTest(AND host = '$host', $host) $conditionalTest(AND app_id = '$app_id', $app_id)
ORDER BY time
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    updated_at as time,
    len as jobs
FROM $DB.metrics_queue

WHERE
    time >= toDateTime(1620735948)
    AND name = 'Job'  AND host = 'crawler-1'   AND app_id = 'rusty-spider' 
ORDER BY time
